name: An Abomination (SparkAcademy)
description: Statistically speaking, in hindsight, hypothetically, if one were to consider,  in theory,  retrospectively, apparently, it is doubtless that you could probably, somehow, seemingly, tentatively, conceivably, supposedly, presumptively, assumedly, theoretically, in a sense, in all likelihood, in a manner, ambiguously, dubiously, irresolutely enjoy this monstrosity.
